thread.title: Elijah Cummings Says He Asked Trump to Tone Down Rhetoric About Black Neighborhoods
thread.title_full: Elijah Cummings Says He Asked Trump to Tone Down Rhetoric About Black Neighborhoods - Washington Wire - WSJ

author: Ted Mann
title: Elijah Cummings Says He Asked Trump to Tone Down Rhetoric About Black Neighborhoods
text: Rep. Elijah Cummings said Wednesday that he used a meeting with President Donald Trump on prescription drug prices to deliver an additional message: don’t speak about America’s black communities like they’re all in crisis. Mr. Cummings, a veteran Democratic lawmaker from Baltimore, said he asked Mr. Trump to tone down the rhetoric about African-American majority   Capital Journal Daybreak: Health Plan Q&A, More
